about_the_game:
STORY

Christmas Eve 202X, somewhere in the USA. The homeless Protagonist Richard stamps through the snow to find a shelter to protect him from the cold. Luckily he finds an abandoned house where he can rest. Later that night he awakes from a strange sound coming from the fireplace. To his surprise a pretty woman in a seductive Santa Dress crawled down the chimney, claiming that the house belonged to her.
What will Richard do?

CHARACTERS


Name: Richard Charles Gein-Bundy
Age: 22
Height: 183 cm
Weight: 59 kg
Richard grew up in poverty at his dad's trailer. As a teenager, he ran away and started to live on the street. He is a loner and prefers to survive independently instead of relying on others.


Name: Joanne Aileen Cotton
Age: 21
Height: 166 cm
Weight: 50 kg
Joanne inherit the house of her beloved late grandmother but had to leave for a long time to stay in a hospital for treatment. She is cheerful but sometimes seems to be in her own little world.

FEATURES

-Different Endings
-Original handmade Anime Art, NO AI is used
-Achievements
-CG Gallery
-very short
-Supports Windows and Linux
